entities.description: Marijuana or any cannabis product use despite causing arguments or problems with family or friends.
Increased chance of getting physically hurt due to marijuana or any cannabis product use.
Feeling irritable or angry as a result of stopping or reducing marijuana use.
Feeling anxious or nervous as a result of stopping or reducing marijuana use.
